Package com.asprise.util.jtwain.lowlevel

Low-level APIs for advanced development of TWAIN applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Capability Represents a TWAIN capability.
Control Utility class to control TWAIN operations.
DataType Represents TWAIN important data structures.
DataTypeIdentity Java wrapper for TWAIN Identity structure.
DataTypeImageInfo Java wrapper for TWAIN ImageInfo structure.
DataTypeImageLayout Java wrapper for TWAIN ImageLayout structure.
DataTypeVersion Java wrapper for TWAIN Version structure.
ItemType General Java wrapper for TWAIN item type.
ItemTypeFix32 Java wrapper for TWAIN item type: FIX32.
ItemTypeFrame Java wrapper for TWAIN item type: FRAME
ItemTypeInteger Java wrapper for TWAIN item type: integers, eg.
ItemTypeString Java wrapper for TWAIN item type: strings, e.g.
OperationResult Represents an operation result.
ValueContainer General Java wrapper for TWAIN value containers.
ValueContainerArray Java wrapper for TWAIN value container: ARRAY
ValueContainerEnumeration Java wrapper for TWAIN value container: ENUMERATION
ValueContainerOneValue Java wrapper for TWAIN value container: ONEVALUE
ValueContainerRange Java wrapper for TWAIN value container: RANGE
